415479a0-f49a-4d43-80e2-8e7fa8b1777a.name: Wedge Antilles
415479a0-f49a-4d43-80e2-8e7fa8b1777a.text: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

db15b682-ce33-4205-bb8f-e48116f0a65b.name: Garven Dreis
db15b682-ce33-4205-bb8f-e48116f0a65b.text: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

a367ce8d-5962-42df-bd4e-18b215e24c3c.name: Biggs Darklighter
a367ce8d-5962-42df-bd4e-18b215e24c3c.text: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

7b1a06b1-23e9-4b3e-9624-ff0aa2e2538b.name: Luke Skywalker
7b1a06b1-23e9-4b3e-9624-ff0aa2e2538b.text: When defending, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

e6e95666-a833-4f14-a3f0-4608d637d001.name: "Dutch" Vander
e6e95666-a833-4f14-a3f0-4608d637d001.text: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2.  The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

7e3ed9e3-06fd-4443-b118-3c87f0680acd.name: Horton Salm
7e3ed9e3-06fd-4443-b118-3c87f0680acd.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

ed2d4ae0-48a5-42c5-ada5-a65eb565a924.name: "Winged Gundark"
ed2d4ae0-48a5-42c5-ada5-a65eb565a924.text: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

7ba7ff59-ac69-4a55-b25d-3c83f05538b3.name: "Night Beast"
7ba7ff59-ac69-4a55-b25d-3c83f05538b3.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

265bafc6-9be8-47d7-b303-cc9160987d2d.name: "Backstabber"
265bafc6-9be8-47d7-b303-cc9160987d2d.text: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

b0991bcc-4b8f-4f13-abb4-32ea3e5c70bd.name: "Dark Curse"
b0991bcc-4b8f-4f13-abb4-32ea3e5c70bd.text: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

83f28240-1a52-4cfd-bd9a-ea8dc0f36fde.name: "Mauler Mithel"
83f28240-1a52-4cfd-bd9a-ea8dc0f36fde.text: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

ddf89e7a-e9cc-48b8-a779-c9d110065915.name: "Howlrunner"
ddf89e7a-e9cc-48b8-a779-c9d110065915.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

d1cc6eb6-1d0e-4d3b-b56b-13ee174ffca5.name: Maarek Stele
d1cc6eb6-1d0e-4d3b-b56b-13ee174ffca5.text: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

907f1b4b-6b8e-47ef-a2d4-8a2a00a03296.name: Darth Vader
907f1b4b-6b8e-47ef-a2d4-8a2a00a03296.text: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

ee2099e5-a987-4190-9fe9-728ac61ecc4b.name: "Fel's Wrath"
ee2099e5-a987-4190-9fe9-728ac61ecc4b.text: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

90f05fd7-6dcf-4ad5-9d45-f45fdf881297.name: Turr Phennir
90f05fd7-6dcf-4ad5-9d45-f45fdf881297.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

b1c1b154-04f7-4285-afb7-b85e1ad9c0e0.name: Soontir Fel
b1c1b154-04f7-4285-afb7-b85e1ad9c0e0.text: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

8a183ddc-facc-42b2-9b70-1addfc2cbe56.name: Tycho Celchu
8a183ddc-facc-42b2-9b70-1addfc2cbe56.text: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

9f84ba99-45eb-44dc-b626-6c794f84fa59.name: Arvel Crynyd
9f84ba99-45eb-44dc-b626-6c794f84fa59.text: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

6a8ed209-3aa2-40fd-8b78-046fcf243736.name: Chewbacca
6a8ed209-3aa2-40fd-8b78-046fcf243736.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

c9fc4399-64fd-440b-a9a2-e7eb687660cf.name: Lando Calrissian
c9fc4399-64fd-440b-a9a2-e7eb687660cf.text: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

052d36f7-4c56-457c-b2e1-d5b29e4c55fc.name: Han Solo
052d36f7-4c56-457c-b2e1-d5b29e4c55fc.text: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice.  If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

e4d243d8-cec0-45af-b3ac-1cf0ee2a74b1.name: Kath Scarlet
e4d243d8-cec0-45af-b3ac-1cf0ee2a74b1.text: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 result.

5490b8c3-5b39-4ccd-9b60-1995d78233f5.name: Boba Fett
5490b8c3-5b39-4ccd-9b60-1995d78233f5.text: When you reveal a bank maneuver ( or ), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

c46c0067-1dc4-4f7a-89c8-42e6f95d0d53.name: Krassis Trelix
c46c0067-1dc4-4f7a-89c8-42e6f95d0d53.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

2cfc2544-ab29-4aee-b3af-98a014a15390.name: Ten Numb
2cfc2544-ab29-4aee-b3af-98a014a15390.text: When attacking, 1 of your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

53e2e6e6-5961-441e-97f6-6dfd887ded7d.name: Ibtisam
53e2e6e6-5961-441e-97f6-6dfd887ded7d.text: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

650ecfe7-1e47-4fdd-8658-a5ccb1856e9e.name: Roark Garnet
650ecfe7-1e47-4fdd-8658-a5ccb1856e9e.text: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

02581002-4ab4-417a-b6c2-9b48263fe9f8.name: Kyle Katarn
02581002-4ab4-417a-b6c2-9b48263fe9f8.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

bc89d49e-3b81-4876-a83b-2ea8e60f260c.name: Jan Ors
bc89d49e-3b81-4876-a83b-2ea8e60f260c.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

1d47c0cb-95ea-448b-94a1-02343df68a86.name: Captain Jonus
1d47c0cb-95ea-448b-94a1-02343df68a86.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

0f0c8f58-7cc7-4ffd-882c-4b6aeeb986d5.name: Major Rhymer
0f0c8f58-7cc7-4ffd-882c-4b6aeeb986d5.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

31ea72db-adaf-4e4f-a0a7-6d04fd9a5e0d.name: Captain Kagi
31ea72db-adaf-4e4f-a0a7-6d04fd9a5e0d.text: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

2422e2ee-32b2-45b4-9421-4f082e2a67db.name: Colonel Jendon
2422e2ee-32b2-45b4-9421-4f082e2a67db.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

6527078f-239a-4c38-94db-60f8b671edde.name: Captain Yorr
6527078f-239a-4c38-94db-60f8b671edde.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

3f801a31-51c5-4802-86a8-8bef253560ca.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
3f801a31-51c5-4802-86a8-8bef253560ca.text: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ( 1) or ( 1) template instead of the ( 1) template.

6240dcc8-73be-49db-90e8-218bf5ff77ef.name: Tetran Cowall
6240dcc8-73be-49db-90e8-218bf5ff77ef.text: When you reveal a maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

de56c4db-bdff-4be6-a5f8-52f4c317ed78.name: Kir Kanos
de56c4db-bdff-4be6-a5f8-52f4c317ed78.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 result to your roll.

22a5f356-4ce7-423d-8552-aa1482c943b8.name: Carnor Jax
22a5f356-4ce7-423d-8552-aa1482c943b8.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

dc1b9283-b7f3-4832-b0bc-2904ed43fae3.name: Lieutenant Blount
dc1b9283-b7f3-4832-b0bc-2904ed43fae3.text: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

652bcf1d-bb53-45f9-894e-2d28191097d1.name: Airen Cracken
652bcf1d-bb53-45f9-894e-2d28191097d1.text: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.

34a31b89-91a0-4ebc-8d6e-7049b6d292be.name: Colonel Vessery
34a31b89-91a0-4ebc-8d6e-7049b6d292be.text: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

badc2ab7-def5-4765-a273-5cd7314b2532.name: Rexler Brath
badc2ab7-def5-4765-a273-5cd7314b2532.text: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

cc305251-4164-4d5f-8777-fa74232d68ea.name: Etahn A'baht
cc305251-4164-4d5f-8777-fa74232d68ea.text: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its results to a result.

0ca1307b-ffb6-4053-8e93-cfbd8199b867.name: Corran Horn
0ca1307b-ffb6-4053-8e93-cfbd8199b867.text: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack.  You cannot attack during the next round.

a6c6b9b6-0572-4d2f-8394-a0b216bb3e08.name: "Echo"
a6c6b9b6-0572-4d2f-8394-a0b216bb3e08.text: When you decloak, you must use the ( 2) or ( 2) template instead of the ( 2) template.

8de347f4-c638-4ae5-9ff0-8325ab42102a.name: "Whisper"
8de347f4-c638-4ae5-9ff0-8325ab42102a.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

01cd9b06-c674-41c7-bd9f-d78278f442aa.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
01cd9b06-c674-41c7-bd9f-d78278f442aa.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

f4ed38d0-1dbb-4139-89f4-8c5399502ee8.name: Wes Janson
f4ed38d0-1dbb-4139-89f4-8c5399502ee8.text: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

9d8a74bb-cebb-41a5-9624-23d1000f8e5b.name: Jek Porkins
9d8a74bb-cebb-41a5-9624-23d1000f8e5b.text: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

f4198e3c-5660-43ef-b269-d8369f6ac895.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
f4198e3c-5660-43ef-b269-d8369f6ac895.text: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

fec5dbdc-469a-4a32-8352-8194b45316fb.name: Tarn Mison
fec5dbdc-469a-4a32-8352-8194b45316fb.text: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

bde407fc-7aa7-4ce4-b897-ce4f6a989bba.name: Jake Farrell
bde407fc-7aa7-4ce4-b897-ce4f6a989bba.text: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

1fdf65f8-3376-47e6-bdc0-12440cb18fdf.name: Gemmer Sojan
1fdf65f8-3376-47e6-bdc0-12440cb18fdf.text: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

dac95542-f63f-48e2-8471-fa45871935aa.name: Keyan Farlander
dac95542-f63f-48e2-8471-fa45871935aa.text: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your results to results.

b57c52eb-2179-4fcb-abd8-edd8510c0f54.name: Nera Dantels
b57c52eb-2179-4fcb-abd8-edd8510c0f54.text: You can perform secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

1f307bd5-276d-47c8-94c6-5fe48a63ab77.name: Eaden Vrill
1f307bd5-276d-47c8-94c6-5fe48a63ab77.text: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

0fa22f60-4091-47eb-8040-16037c819e6f.name: "Leebo"
0fa22f60-4091-47eb-8040-16037c819e6f.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

ad9ac054-84a0-4d48-b942-b3d1ee073d6a.name: Dash Rendar
ad9ac054-84a0-4d48-b942-b3d1ee073d6a.text: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

2f0f445e-3df0-48a8-8f7f-d122a96284a3.name: Captain Oicunn
2f0f445e-3df0-48a8-8f7f-d122a96284a3.text: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

3d02caac-b361-404d-9d78-de1d31ae76f7.name: Commander Kenkirk
3d02caac-b361-404d-9d78-de1d31ae76f7.text: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

0c110ae0-69b9-4fe0-9cf5-fd3aa1f7f9fe.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
0c110ae0-69b9-4fe0-9cf5-fd3aa1f7f9fe.text: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

9417631f-8131-4a16-8c4b-6d4ca5878737.name: Prince Xizor
9417631f-8131-4a16-8c4b-6d4ca5878737.text: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled or result instead of you.

6a086d91-f3f3-4e2d-8832-2573c072497b.name: Guri
6a086d91-f3f3-4e2d-8832-2573c072497b.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

d4804b02-6943-4d43-adab-915ed6758334.name: Serissu
d4804b02-6943-4d43-adab-915ed6758334.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

152e7dc5-1273-47be-a09c-7909e5fabb59.name: Laetin A'shera
152e7dc5-1273-47be-a09c-7909e5fabb59.text: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

b02d9bf5-3d68-4aeb-9c6d-a5b866bd7079.name: IG-88A
b02d9bf5-3d68-4aeb-9c6d-a5b866bd7079.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

0fdede82-da15-43cd-9087-98d0409aba04.name: IG-88B
0fdede82-da15-43cd-9087-98d0409aba04.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

c8f1bae9-a9a3-4605-9a98-555d9f4e5ad9.name: IG-88C
c8f1bae9-a9a3-4605-9a98-555d9f4e5ad9.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

af4d6869-60ad-4c30-bf2f-8561f0ed7430.name: IG-88D
af4d6869-60ad-4c30-bf2f-8561f0ed7430.text: You may execute the ( 3) or ( 3) maneuver using the corresponding ( 3) or ( 3) template.

b10e3c74-bfc1-4e46-8180-0a98b78e2c96.name: N'Dru Suhlak
b10e3c74-bfc1-4e46-8180-0a98b78e2c96.text: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

7bd7aac1-242d-4b52-be89-a74c8a0a970b.name: Kaa'To Leeachos
7bd7aac1-242d-4b52-be89-a74c8a0a970b.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

fbba2d9d-ac25-4e8a-b60c-2c1e771d98dc.name: Boba Fett (Scum)
fbba2d9d-ac25-4e8a-b60c-2c1e771d98dc.text: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

ce7929f2-4a88-46d5-9508-d648dc95b418.name: Kath Scarlet (Scum)
ce7929f2-4a88-46d5-9508-d648dc95b418.text: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

3772aec7-e4e2-4f02-a6c2-4be764334fdc.name: Emon Azzameen
3772aec7-e4e2-4f02-a6c2-4be764334fdc.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [ 3], [ 3], or [ 3] template instead of the [ 1] template.

c7cd132a-95e2-43a0-b5db-b128e9008cc5.name: Kavil
c7cd132a-95e2-43a0-b5db-b128e9008cc5.text: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

27cefbdf-10bd-44b3-b05a-ccd37a277bf0.name: Drea Renthal
27cefbdf-10bd-44b3-b05a-ccd37a277bf0.text: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

410d87ca-4b10-437b-9a4b-4a802c6e46bc.name: Dace Bonearm
410d87ca-4b10-437b-9a4b-4a802c6e46bc.text: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

f47cd93d-31d7-4199-9704-53aa6cdd11ad.name: Palob Godalhi
f47cd93d-31d7-4199-9704-53aa6cdd11ad.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

6646cb7d-0e62-48d0-9861-6575b9a2bc9a.name: Torkil Mux
6646cb7d-0e62-48d0-9861-6575b9a2bc9a.text: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

549ca278-b2c8-40ba-8736-59e2aca0aefc.name: Commander Alozen
549ca278-b2c8-40ba-8736-59e2aca0aefc.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.
